00012     public abstract class TripService : ITripService, ICrossDomainPolicyResponder
00013     {

00016 
00017         public abstract int CreateNewTrip(string username, string tripName, string tripDescription);
00018 
00019         public abstract List<Trip> GetTripsForUser(string username);
00020 
00021         public abstract List<Trip> GetAllTrips();
00022 
00023         public abstract List<PositionNode> GetPositionNodesForTrip(int tripID);
00024 
00025         public abstract int AddPositionNode(PositionNode node);
00026 
00027         public virtual void AddManyPositionNodes(IEnumerable<PositionNode> nodes)
00028         {
00029             foreach (PositionNode noed in nodes) AddPositionNode(noed);
00030         }
00031 
00032         public abstract void UpdateTripDescription(int tripID, string tripDescription);
00033 
00034         public abstract void UpdatePositionNodeDescription(int tripID, int nodeNumber, string nodeDescription);

00038         public static event Action<int, int> DatabaseInsert;
00039         public static event Action<string> DatabaseQuery;
00040 
00041         protected virtual void OnDatabaseInsert(int tripCount, int positionNodeCount)
00042         {
00043             if (DatabaseInsert != null) DatabaseInsert(tripCount, positionNodeCount);
00044         }
00045 
00046         protected virtual void OnDatabaseQuery(string queryInfo)
00047         {
00048             if (DatabaseQuery != null) DatabaseQuery(queryInfo);
00049         }
00050         #endregion

00052         #region Making Silverlight suck less
00053         public Stream GetSilverlightPolicy()
00054         {
00055             string result = @"<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8""?>
00056                 <access-policy>
00057                     <cross-domain-access>
00058                         <policy>
00059                             <allow-from>
00060                                 <domain uri=""*""/>
00061                             </allow-from>
00062                             <grant-to>
00063                                 <resource path=""/"" include-subpaths=""true""/>
00064                             </grant-to>
00065                         </policy>
00066                     </cross-domain-access>
00067                 </access-policy>";
00068             return StringToStream(result);
00069 
00070         }
00071 
00072         public Stream GetFlashPolicy()
00073         {
00074             string result = @"<?xml version=""1.0""?>
00075                             <!DOCTYPE cross-domain-policy SYSTEM ""http://www.macromedia.com/xml/dtds/cross-domain-policy.dtd"">
00076                             <cross-domain-policy>
00077                                 <allow-access-from domain=""*"" />
00078                                 <allow-http-request-headers-from domain=""*"" headers=""SOAPAction"" />
00079                             </cross-domain-policy>";
00080             return StringToStream(result);
00081         }
00082 
00083         private Stream StringToStream(string result)
00084         {
00085             WebOperationContext.Current.OutgoingResponse.ContentType = "application/xml";
00086             return new MemoryStream(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(result));
00087         }
00088         #endregion
00089     }
